-----Original Message-----
From: Rob Berryhill [mailto:racefan@...]

To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: RE: Re[2]: [EQ-Monks] What to buy?


From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>

One question about teh Treant Fist quest - are the quest components no drop?

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
SCARAB on Solusek Ro


> From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
>
> NOT werewolf talons, these are for the crafted BP quest and
> they are no
> drop. What you need are werewolf claws. And it was not rare
> to see them sold
> for 1k. I traded the Lupine Claw Gauntlets for a Crown of the
> Froglok King
> when I got my Treant Fists, so it can be a very valuable item.
>
